about_the_game:
DO NOT PURCHASE IF YOU OWN DELUXE CONTENT DLC

This DLC is currently not available within the Unreal Table Ball Demo

Colour Pack 2

Do you want to customise your bumpers and balls?

WELL NOW YOU CAN

Features

New Colours

4 new colours to choose from.

Wanting a nice magenta ball? Well you can have that.

Want your bumpers to be cyan? You can do that too

Want your bumpers to be yellow while your ball is coral red? OF COURSE YOU CAN.

What colours are included?

Magenta, Cyan, Yellow, Coral Red, AND MORE

What colours are not included?

The colours of our lord Klooloo.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M

  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics

  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: The Table Ball - Colour Pack 2 adds four different colours that can be used to customise your Table Ball experience. Make your bumpers and balls magenta, cyan, yellow or coral red, it's all up to you in the Table Ball - Colour Pack 2
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Swedish
